We can think of $\purpleC{28}$ as $\purpleC{2\text{ tens}}$ and $\purpleC{8 \text{ ones}}$.  

We can think of $\blueD{72}$ as $\blueD{7\text{ tens}}$ and $\blueD{2\text{ ones}}$.

$\phantom{=}\purpleC{28}+\blueD{72}$

$=\purpleC{2\text{ tens}}+\purpleC{8\text{ ones}}+\blueD{7\text{ tens}}+\blueD{2\text{ ones}}$

$= \purpleC{2\text{ tens}}+\blueD{7\text{ tens}}+\purpleC{8\text{ ones}}+\blueD{2\text{ ones}}$
The answer: $2 \text{ tens}+7\text{ tens} +8 \text{ ones}+2 \text{ ones}$
